title.rendered: December 2023 Client of the Month: Regent Branding

content.rendered:
This month we spoke to Hamzah, CEO at Regent Branding!

Regent Branding | Facebook | LinkedIn

Hey! Tell us about your business.

Regent Branding is a remote and flexible digital consultancy that has grown from a 1-man band to a 32-strong team worldwide. We help clients dominate their digital strategy with paid search, paid social, search marketing, mobile apps and websites. Our most popular arm of the business, digital training, helps upskill and uplift current businesses who are keen to grow digitally. We’ve been with TAP since day 1 and they’ve seen us grow consistently.

What drove you to start your business?

I had a passion for digital marketing, and I wanted to create a new benchmark for excellence. I’d always been entrepreneurial, and loved the thrill of creating something of value for others and helping them grow their businesses.

What particular challenges did you have to overcome in setting up your business, and since then?

Finding the best staff was incredibly difficult, but we resolved this issue by hiring globally, finding and retaining some amazing talent. We were also up against some huge players in the realm of web design and apps, so we offered friendly pay monthly packages and grew our reputation from the ground up.

COVID was a huge challenge for us, but we approached it by pausing client contracts if they couldn’t pay, and offering struggling clients a discretionary discount as well. We also pivoted to creating software and mobile app games, which helped keep us afloat and unlocked a whole new revenue stream for us.

Why did you choose The Accountancy Partnership?

TAP has a personal, friendly and talented team. I’ve called hundreds of times with the most basic questions, and every single time Tabby has been supportive, professional and honest. I love how you treat my business like it’s your own, and offer the advice I need to hear proactively.

Have we helped you overcome any challenges, and if so, how?

Yes! I had some confusion around charging international clients and you helped clear it up right away.

What do you have planned for your business in future?

Further growth internationally and new software products internally.

 
Learn more about our online accounting services for businesses just like Hamzah. Call 020 3355 4047 or get an instant online quote.
